item.title: First experience with Jetpack Compose
item.author: Author
item.description: onCreate It’s been a couple of weeks since Jetpack Compose reached in alpha state. So, I thought I should start giving it a try. Getting started with it is not that hard. There are a lot of options, but I will render what worked for me: Joe Birch’s blog. Stack Overflow A quick read through the Google Codelabs Jetpack sample apps from Google’s repository (Mostly looking at JetNews) Note This posts code example is not a best practice example.
